channel.title: Spore ERROR please help
channel.description:
Allright well i have a problem with this game atm when i try to open the game it says Open gl error. After searching for a bit on the internet i found out that i needed to download Sporeapp.exe so i downloaded it and i tryed replacing it with its original like it said but its not letting me.
(I BOUGHT THE GAME)
I tried to do this guide but im not sure if i did it right
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lSpr0vC3CAg&feature=related
It used to Say registration Key code but not anymore!
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eBsyW1auKnU
[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/4589/47256f52e8c0438c948450c.png[/img] Cumputer Details.
[img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/9345/134096822c3d4f0eb3abba1.png[/img]
----ERRORS---- [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/4229/89e05201c0fb4ee38368560.png[/img]
The file is on my desktop "SporeApp.EXE" when i click it. (im not sure if i place it in my c:/drive or some were else) [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/6069/7b4f32972ac9485daa1c85c.png[/img]
It turns black after the error above, then it opens this window. [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/1811/e39224d641e84fc4b5c46dd.png[/img]
